sentence: what is the earliest flight , in the morning from boston to pittsburgh
sq2:
SELECT DISTINCT  '"'||v0.flight_id||'"', v0.departure_time, '"'||v6.airport_code||'"',
 '"'||v7.city_code||'"', '"'||v7.city_name||'"',
 '"'||v8.airport_code||'"', '"'||v9.city_code||'"',
 '"'||v9.city_name||'"' FROM flight v0, airport_service v6,
 city v7, airport_service v8, city v9 
WHERE ((v0.departure_time = (
SELECT MIN (v1.departure_time) FROM flight v1 
WHERE ((v1.departure_time BETWEEN  0 
AND  1200) AND ((v1.from_airport IN (
SELECT v2.airport_code FROM airport_service v2 
WHERE (v2.city_code IN (
SELECT v3.city_code FROM city v3 
WHERE (v3.city_name = 'BOSTON'))))) 
AND (v1.to_airport IN (
SELECT v4.airport_code FROM airport_service v4 
WHERE (v4.city_code IN (
SELECT v5.city_code FROM city v5 
WHERE (v5.city_name = 'PITTSBURGH'))))))))) 
AND ((v0.departure_time BETWEEN  0 AND  1200) 
AND (((v0.from_airport = ANY v6.airport_code) AND ((v6.city_code = ANY v7.city_code) 
AND (v7.city_name = 'BOSTON'))) 
AND ((v0.to_airport = ANY v8.airport_code) AND ((v8.city_code = ANY v9.city_code) 
AND (v9.city_name = 'PITTSBURGH'))))));
sql: ( SELECT DISTINCT FLIGHT.FLIGHT_ID FROM FLIGHT WHERE ( FLIGHT.DEPARTURE_TIME = ( SELECT MIN ( FLIGHT.DEPARTURE_TIME ) FROM FLIGHT WHERE ( FLIGHT.DEPARTURE_TIME BETWEEN 0 AND 1200 AND ( FLIGHT . FROM_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' BOSTON ' ) ) AND FLIGHT . TO_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' PITTSBURGH ' ) ) ) ) ) AND ( FLIGHT.DEPARTURE_TIME BETWEEN 0 AND 1200 AND ( FLIGHT . FROM_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' BOSTON ' ) ) AND FLIGHT . TO_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' PITTSBURGH ' ) ) ) ) ) ) ;
